items.lex-en-us-description: DBpedia (from "DB" for "database") is a project aiming to extract structured content from the information created as part of the Wikipedia project. This structured information is then made available on the World Wide Web. DBpedia allows users to semantically query relationships and properties associated with Wikipedia resources, including links to other related datasets. DBpedia has been described by Tim Berners-Lee as one of the more famous parts of the decentralized Linked Data effort.
items.lex-es-description: DBpedia es un proyecto para la extracción de datos de Wikipedia para proponer una versión Web semántica. Este proyecto es realizado por la Universidad de Leipzig, Universidad Libre de Berlín y la compañía OpenLink Software.
items.lex-zh-description: DBpedia （DB乃是資料庫，database的意思，也可做資料庫百科全書解） 是一項從維基百科裡萃取結構化內容的專案計畫。這些計畫所得的結構化資訊，也將放在網際網路中公開讓人取閱。DBpedia允許使用者查詢跟維基百科相關資源之間的關係與性質，甚至也可查詢從維基百科外連到其他資料組的內容。DBpedia曾被網際網路創始人提姆·柏納-李評論為世界上最有名的幾個去中心化連結資料的專題之一。
items.lex-en-gb-description: DBpedia (from "DB" for "database") is a project aiming to extract structured content from the information created as part of the Wikipedia project. This structured information is then made available on the World Wide Web. DBpedia allows users to semantically query relationships and properties associated with Wikipedia resources, including links to other related datasets. DBpedia has been described by Tim Berners-Lee as one of the more famous parts of the decentralised Linked Data effort.
